pages.text: Herbs are plants and fungi that can be used in a Mortar & Pestle to obtain refined resources for brewing and rituals.$(br2)Herbs can be planted in a Infused Dirt to bonemeal it.
Spirit Blooms small flower can be found in the Swamp and Mangrove Swamp biome. It can be used to create Spirit Powder.
These are mushrooms that can be found in the Old Growth Pine Taiga and Mushroom Fields biomes.It can be used to create Dreams Paste.
These small kelp plants can be found in the bottom of Ocean biomes. It can be used to create Siren Paste.$(br2)The kelp can be eaten and will grant you the Water Breathing effect for 10 seconds.
Ghost Fern are plants that  grows in the $(l:hexalia:world_gen/enchanted_bayou)Enchanted Bayou$() biome as well as Dark Forests. It can be used to create Ghost Powder.
Celestial Blooms are flowers that can be found in Meadows, this plant is known to capture celestial energy that can be infused into items.
